title: How to Access Netflix on PlayStation 3

steps.title: Subscribe to Netflix.
steps.content: Subscribe to Netflix. Go to the website and look up the optional plans. Unlimited instant streaming is included in all Netflix plans, with the option to also receive movies by mail. Instant streaming through Netflix is only available in the United States and Canada. The pricing for instant streaming is the same amount in both American and Canadian dollars. For around $7.99 per month, you can stream any movies and television shows that are available through their "Watch Instantly" database. This plan will also let you watch TV from computers that are connected to the Internet. Sign up for the free trial, which will allow you 1 month of free watching before charging your credit card.

steps.title: Connect your PlayStation 3 to the Internet, if it is not already connected.
steps.content: Connect your PlayStation 3 to the Internet, if it is not already connected.

steps.title: Sign into your PlayStation Network account.
steps.content: Sign into your PlayStation Network account. The account is included when you buy a PlayStation 3. To sign up, you will need to read and agree with the terms and conditions, enter your name, date of birth and address. Then, create a username and password and a User ID that is viewed by the public. You can also choose to enter your credit card details if you intend to buy games or applications.

steps.title: Go to the XMB on your PlayStation 3.
steps.content: Go to the XMB on your PlayStation 3. XMB means Xross Media Bar. (Xross is pronounced "cross.") This is the user interface for the PlayStation 3 that allows you to navigate through the games and features of your PlayStation 3 by scrolling horizontally and then vertically through icons.

steps.title: Go to the section called "PlayStation Network" on your XMB interface.
steps.content: Go to the section called "PlayStation Network" on your XMB interface. Click on "What's New."

steps.title: Follow the screen prompt to download the Netflix application.
steps.content: Follow the screen prompt to download the Netflix application.

steps.title: Enter your username and password on your Netflix account.
steps.content: Enter your username and password on your Netflix account.

steps.title: Click on movie or television show icons with your remote or controller and add them to your "Instant Queue."
steps.content: Click on movie or television show icons with your remote or controller and add them to your "Instant Queue." You can also select movies to watch and stream them instantly.
